Description.Name: The Aurigan Directorate
Description.Details:
"We found Sir Raju's 'Mech. It was completely cored out. Nobody survives a hit like that."


"Things aren't looking so hot around here, what with the coup and all. [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreHouseEspinosa],House Espinosa]]'s Directorate is the new de facto government of the [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreAuriganReach],Aurigan Reach]]. I'm sorry we couldn't do more. A lot of good people died today, and I have a feeling this is only the beginning. We'd better make ourselves scarce in these parts and lay low for a while.
